p: Studies on the dispersal of Cx. pipiens in urban habitats found maximum flight ranges of 1.98 km [ 29] and 2.48 km [ 30]. However, given the low probability of recapturing a marked mosquito at large distances from the point of release, we used a conservative radius of up to 5km for the buffer area. We also assessed the effect of changing the size of the radius on the risk of RVF transmission.
